named-query.name: Metanalise.buscarPorId
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM br.com.smadp.entity.Metanalise m LEFT JOIN FETCH m.baseDados WHERE m.id = ?1

named-query.name: Metanalise.buscarNaoFinalizadas
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT m FROM br.com.smadp.entity.Metanalise m JOIN FETCH m.etapas e WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM br.com.smadp.entity.MetanaliseMetanaliseEtapa mme WHERE mme.metanalise = m AND mme.concluida = true) < 5

named-query.name: Metanalise.countTitulo
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM br.com.smadp.entity.Metanalise m WHERE m.titulo = :titulo AND (:id IS NULL OR m.id <> :id)
